here's the thing tho... we don't want to rely on the LLM to route things. we can rely on it for suggestions, but we want to basically defer to using deterministic paths like slash commands and even chain together slash commands. plz think hard about this and how we can make this work, or if we perhaps already are in some adws? or existing slash commands? assess the situation. think ultra hard.
